ZDO_MgmtLeaveReq_t Struct Reference

This request is generated from a Local Device requesting that a Remote Device leave the network or to request that another device leave the network. The Mgmt_Leave_req is generated by a management application which directs the request to a Remote Device where the NLME-LEAVE.request is to be executed using the parameter supplied by Mgmt_Leave_req. More...

#include <zdo.h>


Data Fields

ExtAddr_t deviceAddr
 IEEE address.
uint8_t reserved: 6
 Reserved; can not be changed by user.
uint8_t removeChildren: 1
uint8_t rejoin: 1

Detailed Description

This request is generated from a Local Device requesting that a Remote Device leave the network or to request that another device leave the network. The Mgmt_Leave_req is generated by a management application which directs the request to a Remote Device where the NLME-LEAVE.request is to be executed using the parameter supplied by Mgmt_Leave_req.

IEEE address.

Reserved; can not be changed by user.

Definition at line 697 of file zdo.h.

uint8_t ZDO_MgmtLeaveReq_t::removeChildren

This field has a value of 1 if the device being asked to leave the network is also asked to remove all its child devices, if any. Otherwise, it has a value of 0.

Definition at line 703 of file zdo.h.

uint8_t ZDO_MgmtLeaveReq_t::rejoin

This field has a value of 1 if the device being asked to leave from the current parent is requested to rejoin the network. Otherwise, it has a value of 0.

Definition at line 709 of file zdo.h.
